specific_topics.description: Covers integers, prime numbers, and basic mathematical terms.
Focuses on rules of zero, order of operations, and similar concepts.
Involves manipulation and calculations using fractions and decimals.

subtopics.description: Questions based on math terminology, basic number theory, and manipulation of fractions and decimals.

specific_topics.description: Covers solving and graphing inequalities.
Focuses on solving and graphing linear equations.
Involves solving problems using ratios and percentages.
Covers finding the mean, median, and mode.

subtopics.description: Questions based on inequalities, linear equations, ratios, percentages, and averages.

specific_topics.description: Covers laws of exponents and operations on roots.
Focuses on solving systems of linear equations.
Involves solving and graphing quadratic equations.

subtopics.description: Questions based on exponents, roots, simultaneous equations, and quadratic equations.

specific_topics.description: Covers calculations involving angles and side lengths.
Focuses on properties and calculations related to triangles.
Involves properties of quadrilaterals and circles.
Covers calculations for 2D and 3D shapes.

subtopics.description: Questions based on angles, lengths, triangles, quadrilaterals, circles, perimeter, area, and volume.

specific_topics.description: Focuses on finding slope and distance between points.
Covers calculations of midpoints and intersections of lines.
Involves plotting and interpreting graphs.

subtopics.description: Questions based on slope, distance, midpoint, points of intersection, and graphing.

specific_topics.description: Covers basic trigonometric functions and their applications.
Focuses on fundamental trigonometric identities.
Involves graphing sine, cosine, and tangent functions.

subtopics.description: Questions based on sine, cosine, tangent, trigonometric identities, and graphing.
